#summary &ucirc character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesU

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &ucirc

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ucirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00db/index.htm U+000DB].
  * `&Ucirc` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00db/index.htm U+000DB].
  * `&ucirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fb/index.htm U+000FB].
  * `&ucirc` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fb/index.htm U+000FB].
